Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.Observable<MessageToVirtualView>
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Model
public class Model
extends Observable<MessageToVirtualView>
the model class contains the instance of the game it's represents the game and it's modified by the controller the model every time it's modified updates his modelRepresentation and sends it' to the View so it can be seen by the players

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private ModelRepresentation modelRep  
    private int playerNum  
    private Turn turn  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Model​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersNamesList)
    given playersNamesList a new instance of the game is created

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ModelRepresentation getModelRep()  
    Turn getTurn()
    method that return the current turn
    void notify​(MessageToVirtualView message)
    this notify sends the messageToVirtualView which contains the modelRep to the VirtualView
    void updateModelRep()
    this update modelRep is used when we have to show the current player in which cells she or he can move or build
    void updateModelRep​(StateEnum currentState)
    this update modelRep in addition to save in the modelRep the selected cells saves also the current state of the controller in this way the client can know the state of the context (moveState or buildState)
    void updateModelRep​(java.util.ArrayList<Box> selectedWorkerCells)
    updates the cells where the worker can move
    void updateModelRep​(java.util.List<GodsList> godsList)
    update modelRep used at the beginning of the game is used to show the second (and the third) player the gods selected for the current game by the first player

  • Method Details

    • getTurn

      public Turn getTurn()
      method that return the current turn

    • getModelRep

      public ModelRepresentation getModelRep()
      Returns:
      the current modelRepresentation

    • updateModelRep

      public void updateModelRep()
      this update modelRep is used when we have to show the current player in which cells she or he can move or build

    • updateModelRep

      public void updateModelRep​(StateEnum currentState)
      this update modelRep in addition to save in the modelRep the selected cells saves also the current state of the controller in this way the client can know the state of the context (moveState or buildState)
      Parameters:
      currentState - current State of the game server-side

    • updateModelRep

      public void updateModelRep​(java.util.List<GodsList> godsList)
      update modelRep used at the beginning of the game is used to show the second (and the third) player the gods selected for the current game by the first player
      Parameters:
      godsList - selected gods

    • updateModelRep

      public void updateModelRep​(java.util.ArrayList<Box> selectedWorkerCells)
      updates the cells where the worker can move
      Parameters:
      selectedWorkerCells - the cells where the worker can move to

    • notify

      public void notify​(MessageToVirtualView message)
      this notify sends the messageToVirtualView which contains the modelRep to the VirtualView
      Overrides:
      notify in class Observable<MessageToVirtualView>
